documentation.text:
@dev Emitted when the implementation is upgraded.
 @param implementation Address of the new implementation.

@dev Returns the current implementation.
 @return impl Address of the current implementation

@dev Upgrades the proxy to a new implementation.
 @param newImplementation Address of the new implementation.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Cannot set a proxy implementation to a non-contract address"

arguments.value: Cannot set a proxy implementation to a non-contract address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Cannot set a proxy implementation to a non-contract address"

documentation.text:
@dev Sets the implementation address of the proxy.
 @param newImplementation Address of the new implementation.

devdoc.details: This contract implements a proxy that allows to change the implementation address to which it will delegate. Such a change is called an implementation upgrade.

Upgraded(address).details: Emitted when the implementation is upgraded.

IMPLEMENTATION_SLOT.details: Storage slot with the address of the current implementation. This is the keccak-256 hash of "eip1967.proxy.implementation" subtracted by 1, and is validated in the constructor.

devdoc.title: BaseUpgradeabilityProxy
